duties.title: Review Program Annually
duties.content:
The IS&C will annually update the Cyber Security Program and may request your review of portions of the Program.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not performing requested reviews in the timeframe required.

duties.title: Know Your CIP Senior Manager
duties.content:
Your CIP Senior Manager is Daniel Froetscher, SVP Transmission, Distribution & Customers.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not knowing the name of our CIP Senior Manager. Daniel is a really nice guy and you definitely don't want to hurt his feelings. Plus an auditor might ask you.

duties.title: Create Evidence of Your Duties
duties.content:
It is important to follow every step in our processes to ensure all required tasks are done, including documenting and storing evidence of completion. You must be able to provide all evidence when it is requested. Always provide the information the Regulatory team requests.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not maintaining evidence to document your duties

duties.title: Be Aware
duties.content:
The Information Security & Compliance team will post posters and other awareness material on a quarterly basis. Read, watch and be enlightened.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Removing awareness materials. We know they're cool, but you can't take them home to hang in your bedroom.
